item.title: Moderate Dems in crosshairs after tipping scales on impeachment...
item.description:
www.washingtontimes.com
Rep. Elaine Luria and other moderate Democrats backing impeachment are feeling the heat from conservative groups back home, complicating their re-election bids and giving Republicans hopes of winning back seats lost in 2018 and retaking the House majority in 2020.

item.title: Italy Is Hub of Intrigue for Trump Officials...
item.description:
www.theguardian.com
William Barr reportedly seeking foreign help to investigate origins of FBI inquiry into Trump
